chapter.title: Download
chapter.text:
Please note that ARAnyM is not finished yet. It's a work in progress and the current status is somewhere between alpha and beta. It may work but we can't guarantee anything. Better backup your data first.
Regular releases (source, binary and disk images) are located here. Please note that while we may provide a binary of Aranym for Windows it's not supported as the main development runs on Linux. The Windows version has some severe limitations so do not judge the Aranym by looking at the Windows port, please.
Debian users can fetch ARAnyM with apt from Debian Sid distribution. See ARAnyM page in Debian.
Most up-to-date source code is available in the CVS. You need to have autoconf installed for compiling the CVS source code.
Nightly CVS snapshot (generated at 01:00 GMT) is here. The configure script is pre-generated in this tar file so you don't need the autoconf.
For running ARAnyM you will also need TOS 4.04 from Falcon (available here) or EmuTOS (there is a binary image for Falcon so get that one here).
